sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { FiUsers, FiDroplet, FiCalendar, FiBarChart2, FiUser, FiCheckCircle } from 'react-icons/fi'; const AdminDashboard = () => { // Demo data const users = [ { id: 1, name: 'Demo Donor', email: 'donor@demo.com', role: 'donor', bloodGroup: 'O+', location: 'New York', joined: '2024-01-01' }, { id: 2, name: 'City Blood Bank', email: 'bloodbank@demo.com', role: 'blood-bank', location: 'New York', joined: '2024-01-02' }, { id: 3, name: 'Red Cross NGO', email: 'ngo@demo.com', role: 'ngo', location: 'New York', joined: '2024-01-03' }, { id: 4, name: 'System Admin', email: 'admin@demo.com', role: 'admin', location: 'New York', joined: '2024-01-04' }, { id: 5, name: 'John Smith', email: 'john@example.com', role: 'donor', bloodGroup: 'A+', location: 'Boston', joined: '2024-01-05' } ]; const requests = [ { id: 1, patientName: 'John Smith', bloodGroup: 'A+', units: 2, status: 'open', hospital: 'City General', date: '2024-01-15' }, { id: 2, patientName: 'Sarah Johnson', bloodGroup: 'O-', units: 3, status: 'assigned', hospital: 'Memorial Hospital', date: '2024-01-14' }, { id: 3, patientName: 'Mike Wilson', bloodGroup: 'B+', units: 1, status: 'completed', hospital: 'Queens Medical', date: '2024-01-13' } ]; const camps = [ { id: 1, title: 'Community Blood Drive', location: 'Community Center', status: 'planned', date: '2024-01-20', donors: 50 }, { id: 2, title: 'Emergency Blood Collection', location: 'Red Cross Center', status: 'ongoing', date: '2024-01-25', donors: 30 }, { id: 3, title: 'Corporate Blood Donation', location: 'Tech Corp Campus', status: 'completed', date: '2024-01-18', donors: 80 } ]; // Stats const stats = { totalUsers: users.length, totalDonors: users.filter(u => u.role === 'donor').length, totalRequests: requests.length, totalCamps: camps.length, openRequests: requests.filter(r => r.status === 'open').length, activeCamps: camps.filter(c => c.status === 'ongoing').length }; const getRoleBadgeColor = (role) => { switch(role) { case 'donor': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'blood-bank': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'ngo': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'admin': return 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch(status) { case 'open': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'assigned': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'completed': return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; case 'planned': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'ongoing': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; return (
{/* Header */}

Admin Dashboard

Monitor and manage the LifeLink platform

{/* Stats */}

Total Users

{stats.totalUsers}

Total Donors

{stats.totalDonors}

Blood Requests

{stats.totalRequests}

Donation Camps

{stats.totalCamps}

{/* Users Table */}

System Users

{users.map((user) => ( ))}
Name Email Role Blood Group Location Joined
{user.name}
{user.email}
 {user.role} {user.bloodGroup || '-'} {user.location} {user.joined}
{/* Recent Activity */}
{/* Recent Requests */}

Recent Blood Requests

{requests.slice(0, 5).map((request) => (

{request.patientName}

{request.hospital}

{request.bloodGroup}

{request.date}

{request.status} {request.units} units
))}
{/* Recent Camps */}

Recent Donation Camps

{camps.slice(0, 5).map((camp) => (

{camp.title}

{camp.location}

{camp.status}
{camp.date} {camp.donors} expected donors
))}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
